name: Bed Rail
description: Assists with getting in and out of bed safely.

name: Pill Organizer
description: Helps manage daily medication schedules effectively.

name: Shower Chair
description: Provides stability and support while showering.

name: Walker
description: Provides stability and support for individuals with balance problems or difficulty walking

name: Reacher Grabber
description: Extends reach to pick up objects from the floor or high shelves.

name: Commode Chair
description: Portable toilet for bedside use or when bathroom access is difficult.

name: Non-Slip Bath Mat
description: Prevents slips and falls in the bathtub or shower.

name: Long-Handled Shoe Horn
description: Helps put on shoes without bending over.

name: Medication Reminder Alarm
description: Provides audible reminders to take medication on time.

name: Raised Toilet Seat
description: Elevates the toilet seat to make sitting down and standing up easier.

name: Handheld Magnifier with Light
description: Portable magnifier with built-in illumination for reading small print in low-light conditions.

name: Talking Watch
description: Wristwatch that announces the time and date aloud with a clear voice.

name: Fall Detection Pendant
description: Wearable pendant with automatic fall detection that sends alerts to caregivers or emergency services.

name: Medication Dispenser with Reminders
description: Automated medication dispenser that dispenses the correct medication at the scheduled time and provides reminders, promoting medication adherence.

name: Video Conferencing App
description: Easy-to-use app for video calls and messaging, promoting social connection and communication with family and friends.

name: Smart Medication Dispenser
description: Automated medication dispenser with reminders and remote monitoring capabilities to ensure medication adherence.

name: Wearable Fall Detection Device
description: Discreet wearable device that detects falls and automatically sends alerts to designated contacts.

name: GPS Tracker
description: Small, lightweight GPS tracker that can be attached to clothing or worn as a wristband to monitor location and prevent wandering.

name: Companion Robot
description: AI-powered companion robot that engages in conversations, plays games, and provides reminders, reducing social isolation and loneliness.

name: Light Therapy Lamp
description: Simulates natural sunlight to improve mood, sleep, and energy levels, especially helpful for seasonal affective disorder and depression.

name: Smartwatch with Fall Detection
description: A smartwatch that tracks activity levels, heart rate, and sleep patterns, and also includes fall detection technology to alert emergency contacts in case of a fall.

name: Voice-Activated Smart Home Hub
description: Allows control of home appliances, lighting, and entertainment systems using voice commands, promoting independence and accessibility for individuals with mobility or dexterity limitations.

name: Remote Patient Monitoring System
description: A system that collects and transmits health data (e.g., blood pressure, weight, blood glucose) to healthcare providers, allowing remote monitoring of chronic conditions and early detection of potential issues.

name: Virtual Reality Therapy
description: Uses VR technology to provide immersive experiences for pain management, cognitive rehabilitation, and mental health support.

name: Smart Pill Dispenser with App Connectivity
description: A pill dispenser that connects to a smartphone app, providing reminders, tracking medication adherence, and allowing caregivers to monitor medication usage remotely.

name: Telehealth Platform
description: Allows virtual consultations with healthcare providers, reducing the need for in-person visits and improving access to care for individuals with mobility limitations or living in remote areas.

name: AI-Powered Personal Emergency Response System (PERS)
description: A PERS device with advanced features like fall detection, voice activation, and location tracking, providing enhanced safety and security for individuals living alone.

name: Smart Home Security System with Sensors
description: A security system with door/window sensors, motion detectors, and environmental sensors to monitor home safety, prevent wandering, and detect potential hazards like fire or gas leaks.

name: Assistive Technology for Communication
description: Devices like speech-generating devices, eye-tracking communication systems, and communication boards to assist individuals with speech impairments or communication difficulties.

name: Wearable Fitness Tracker with GPS
description: Tracks activity levels, location, and provides safety features like SOS alerts and geofencing for individuals with dementia or at risk of wandering.

name: Smart Clothing with Health Monitoring
description: Clothing embedded with sensors to monitor vital signs, activity levels, and posture, providing valuable health data and promoting well-being.

name: Augmented Reality Glasses for Visual Assistance
description: Glasses that provide visual cues, object recognition, and navigation assistance for individuals with visual impairments.

name: Brain-Computer Interface for Communication and Control
description: Advanced technology that allows individuals with severe disabilities to control devices and communicate using brain signals.

name: Social Engagement Platform for Seniors
description: An online platform or app that connects seniors with each other and with community resources, promoting social interaction, engagement, and reducing social isolation.

name: AI-Powered Medication Management App
description: An app that uses AI to personalize medication reminders, track side effects, and provide medication information, improving medication adherence and safety.

name: Smart Cane with Obstacle Detection
description: A cane equipped with sensors to detect obstacles and provide audio or haptic feedback, enhancing mobility and safety for individuals with visual impairments.

name: Telepresence Robot
description: A robot that allows remote communication and interaction, enabling virtual visits from family, friends, or healthcare providers.

name: Smart Wheelchair with Autonomous Navigation
description: A wheelchair with advanced features like obstacle avoidance, voice control, and autonomous navigation, enhancing mobility and independence for wheelchair users.

name: Exoskeleton for Mobility Assistance
description: A wearable robotic device that provides support and assistance with walking, standing, and lifting, improving mobility and independence for individuals with lower limb weakness or paralysis.

name: Digital Therapeutic for Cognitive Training
description: A software program or app that provides engaging cognitive exercises and games to improve memory, attention, and other cognitive functions.

name: Personalized Music Therapy App
description: An app that creates personalized playlists based on individual preferences and mood, promoting relaxation, reducing anxiety, and improving emotional well-being.

name: Smart Home Environment Monitoring System
description: Monitors temperature, humidity, and air quality to ensure a comfortable and safe living environment, especially for individuals with respiratory conditions or allergies.

name: AI-Powered Virtual Assistant for Caregivers
description: Provides caregivers with information, support, and resources to manage caregiving tasks, connect with other caregivers, and access expert advice.

name: Smart Bed with Sleep Monitoring and Adjustment
description: A bed with sensors to track sleep patterns and adjust the bed's position to optimize comfort and sleep quality, promoting restful sleep and reducing pressure sores.

name: Wearable Device for Pain Management
description: A device that uses electrical stimulation or other technologies to provide non-invasive pain relief for chronic pain conditions.

name: Virtual Companion for Social Interaction
description: An AI-powered virtual companion that provides conversation, companionship, and cognitive stimulation, reducing social isolation and loneliness.

name: Smart Home Lighting System for Circadian Rhythm Regulation
description: A lighting system that adjusts color temperature and intensity throughout the day to mimic natural light patterns, promoting healthy sleep-wake cycles and improving mood.

name: Assistive Technology for Meal Preparation
description: Adaptive utensils, cutting boards, and other kitchen tools to assist individuals with limited dexterity or mobility in preparing meals independently.

name: Telehealth Platform for Mental Health Support
description: Provides access to virtual therapy sessions, support groups, and mental health resources, improving access to care and reducing stigma.

name: Smart Toilet with Health Monitoring
description: A toilet that analyzes urine for early detection of health issues like urinary tract infections, dehydration, and kidney problems.
